    • Field Detail

      • ATT_TASK_RESULT

        public static final java.lang.String ATT_TASK_RESULT
        For work items with a related task result, the database id of the result. Originally used to track impact analysis.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        Constant Field Values

      • ATT_ARCHIVE

        public static final java.lang.String ATT_ARCHIVE
        An attribute that specifies whether a WorkItemArchive is created for this WorkItem when it is closed. This can be set globally for work item types, or granularly for each item. Normally this is set with an in the .
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ATT_ELECTRONIC_SIGNATURE

        public static final java.lang.String ATT_ELECTRONIC_SIGNATURE
        An electronic signature type for this item. This is set using an and recognized by the page renderer and Notary. If it is null there will be no signature. If it is non-null it should be the generic "Approval" type or one of the specialized types defined in Configuration:ElectronicSignature.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ATT_COMPLETER

        public static final java.lang.String ATT_COMPLETER
        The Display name of the identity that completed the work item
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public static final java.lang.String ATT_POLICY_VIOLATIONS
        List of policy violation maps

        public void setupNotificationConfig​(Resolver resolver,
                                    java.util.Date expiration,
                                    NotificationConfig notifConfig)
                             throws GeneralException
        Setup the work item expiration, reminder, and escalation information (including resetting the wakeupDate and wakeupInterval) based on the given notification configuration and expiration settings.
        Parameters:
        resolver - The Resolver to use to load defaults.
        expiration - The expiration of the work item (possibly null).
        notifConfig - The notification configuration (possibly null).
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getIdentityRequestId

      • setIdentityRequestId

      • addRemediationItem

        public RemediationItem addRemediationItem​(Certification cert,
                                          java.lang.String certItemId,
                                          java.lang.String identity,
                                          RemediationItem.RemediationEntityType entityType,
                                          CertificationAction action,
                                          ProvisioningPlan plan,
                                          java.util.List<sailpoint.web.certification.PolicyTreeNode> contributingEntitlements)
        Add a remediation item to this work item. This will change the description and clear the comments if this work item previously held a single remediation item but now is handling multiple remediation requests. This also clears the notification date on this WorkItem so a notification will be sent again with the new information.
        Parameters:
        cert - The Certification the item came from.
        certItemId - The ID of the CertificationItem.
        identity - The name of the Identity being remediated.
        entityType - The type of item being remediated
        action - The CertificationAction with the remediation info.
        plan - Remediation details
        Returns:
        A RemediationItem that is already on this WorkItem that matches the RemediationItem being added. This will be removed from the WorkItem and replaced. The calling code should delete the returned remediation item.

      • addRemediationItem

        public void addRemediationItem​(Identity actor,
                               RemediationItem.RemediationEntityType remediationType,
                               java.lang.String remediationIdentity,
                               ProvisioningPlan plan,
                               java.lang.String description,
                               java.lang.String comments,
                               java.util.List<sailpoint.web.certification.PolicyTreeNode> contributingEntitlements)
